rathmalana bodhirukkharamadhipathiwa wada wisu walikada siri nyanissara maha nahimiyange 35 wana warshika guna samaru pinkama ha ema wihara sthanaye katina pinkama nimiththen mema 23 wanada sita 25 wanada dakwa pinkam malawak pawathwe. 23 wanada dodamgoda assaji nahimiyange dam desumakda 24 wanada dodanduwa sirikara nahimiyange dam desumakda 25 wanada aluyama 4.30 ta katina chiwara perahara agulane muhudu bada pare nandasila piris mahathage niwase sita arambae. 25 wanada udasana katina chiwara pujawada kaluthara nyanawasa na himiyange anushasana paridi sidu kere.
